page.title: 08Ponteland Plan Proposals
page.content: There will be emphasis on amendments to boundaries for the{Green Belt,} reducing the rate of building to only 180 by 1996 on selected sites.A{Bypass line approved by the Department of Transport with a link road.Sites identified in village centre for new {Shopping }facilities.An extension of the {Conservation Area}is proposed. Following the publication of this Plan and a local exhibition, concern has been expressed over the new Green Belt boundaries which might lead to undesirable development of land.The future of Local Authority housing drew the attention of the County Council who thought the position needed clarifying-private or L.A.housing? The {Northumbria Police Authority } expressed concern that the Bypass would cut off 7 acres of playing field at their Headquarters now in Ponteland
